theEdgeheg:BloodyKatana_Correct.NAME: Bloody Katana
theEdgeheg:BloodyKatana_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Fatal: Heal !M!.

theEdgeheg:MachineGun_Correct.NAME: Machine Gun
theEdgeheg:MachineGun_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage !M! times. NL theedgeheg:GUNS improves shot count instead of damage.

theEdgeheg:GatherChaos_Correct.NAME: Gather Chaos Power
theEdgeheg:GatherChaos_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Gain (# of Chaos Emeralds) x !M! theedgeheg:Chaos_Energy. NL Exhaust.

theEdgeheg:RegularGun_Correct.NAME: Regular Gun
theEdgeheg:RegularGun_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Next turn, gain 1 Energy.

theEdgeheg:ChaosGrenade_Correct.NAME: Chaos Grenade
theEdgeheg:ChaosGrenade_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Fatal: Stun all other enemies. NL Exhaust.
theEdgeheg:ChaosGrenade_Correct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and Stun. NL Fatal: Stun all other enemies. NL Exhaust.

theEdgeheg:NothingPersonal_Correct.NAME: Nothing Personal
theEdgeheg:NothingPersonal_Correct.DESCRIPTION: theedgeheg:Chaos_Control !M!. NL Kills the target. NL Might fail against Elites and Bosses.

theEdgeheg:ChaosBlast_Correct.NAME: Chaos Blast
theEdgeheg:ChaosBlast_Correct.DESCRIPTION: theedgeheg:Chaos_Control !M!. Deal damage equal to the theedgeheg:Chaos_Energy you had before using this card.
theEdgeheg:ChaosBlast_Correct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theedgeheg:Chaos_Control !M!. Deal damage equal to 3 + theedgeheg:Chaos_Energy you had before using this card.

theEdgeheg:RuleOfCool_Correct.NAME: Rule of Cool
theEdgeheg:RuleOfCool_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, gain 1 theedgeheg:Dodge.

theEdgeheg:MasterEmerald_Correct.NAME: Master Emerald
theEdgeheg:MasterEmerald_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 theedgeheg:Chaos_Energy whenever you play a card.

theEdgeheg:BulletStorm_Correct.NAME: Ballet Storm
theEdgeheg:BulletStorm_Correct.DESCRIPTION: theedgeheg:Chaos_Control !M!. NL Gain !theEdgeheg:SecondMagic! theedgeheg:GUNS whenever you play a theedgeheg:Gun_Card.

theEdgeheg:UseAndThrow_Correct.NAME: Use and Throw
theEdgeheg:UseAndThrow_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Select !M! theedgeheg:Gun_Cards. NL Play and Exhaust them. NL Lose 1 theedgeheg:GUNS for every card except the first.
theEdgeheg:UseAndThrow_Correct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select !M! theedgeheg:Gun_Cards. NL Play and Exhaust them. NL Lose 1 theedgeheg:GUNS for every card except the first.

theEdgeheg:DrawGun_Correct.NAME: Draw Gun
theEdgeheg:DrawGun_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Draw a theedgeheg:Gun_Card from your Draw Pile.
theEdgeheg:DrawGun_Correct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a theedgeheg:Gun_Card from your Draw Pile. NL It costs 0 this turn.

theEdgeheg:BlackKatana_Correct.NAME: Black Katana
theEdgeheg:BlackKatana_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Draw a theedgeheg:Katana_Card from your Draw Pile.

theEdgeheg:GunFu_Correct.NAME: Gun-Fu
theEdgeheg:GunFu_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity and theedgeheg:GUNS. NL Gain 1 temporary Dexterity or theedgeheg:GUNS after playing a theedgeheg:Gun_Card or theedgeheg:Katana_Card, respectively.

theEdgeheg:PerfectAim_Correct.NAME: Perfect Aim
theEdgeheg:PerfectAim_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Dexterity. NL Whenever you deal damage, there's a (3*Dexterity)% chance of dealing +50% damage.

theEdgeheg:Sniper_Correct.NAME: Sniper Rifle
theEdgeheg:Sniper_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. theedgeheg:Precise. NL theedgeheg:GUNS and Dexterity count twice.

theEdgeheg:TeleportsBehind_Correct.NAME: Teleport Behind
theEdgeheg:TeleportsBehind_Correct.DESCRIPTION: theedgeheg:Chaos_Control !M!. NL Your next card is played !theEdgeheg:SecondMagic! times.

theEdgeheg:DodgeKatana_Correct.NAME: Dodge Katana
theEdgeheg:DodgeKatana_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Gain theedgeheg:Dodge 1. NL Deal !D! Damage. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Fatal: Gain theedgeheg:Dodge 1.

theEdgeheg:ChaosKatana_Correct.NAME: Chaos Katana
theEdgeheg:ChaosKatana_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 theedgeheg:Chaos_Energy. NL Deal !D! Damage. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Fatal: Gain 2 theedgeheg:Chaos_Energy.

theEdgeheg:QuickKatana_Correct.NAME: Quick Katana
theEdgeheg:QuickKatana_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Fatal: Play this card again.

theEdgeheg:DashKatana_Correct.NAME: Dash Katana
theEdgeheg:DashKatana_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Draw !M! card(s). NL Fatal: Draw 1 Card.

theEdgeheg:Shotgun_Correct.NAME: Shotgun
theEdgeheg:Shotgun_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times to the first enemy, then the same -2 times for the next. NL It keeps going as long as there are shots left. NL theedgeheg:GUNS improves shot count instead of damage.

theEdgeheg:BloodyNodachi_Correct.NAME: Bloody Nodachi
theEdgeheg:BloodyNodachi_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Dexterity counts twice.

theEdgeheg:Knives_Correct.NAME: Knives
theEdgeheg:Knives_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Gain 1 theedgeheg:Chaos_Energy. NL Draw 1 Card. NL Exhaust.
theEdgeheg:Knives_Correct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Gain 1 theedgeheg:Chaos_Energy. NL Draw 1 Card.

theEdgeheg:EndlessKatanas_Correct.NAME: Endless Katanas
theEdgeheg:EndlessKatanas_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity. NL After playing a theedgeheg:Katana_Card, Exhaust it and add a random katana card of the same type to your hand.

theEdgeheg:CoolExplosion_Correct.NAME: Cool Explosion
theEdgeheg:CoolExplosion_Correct.DESCRIPTION: theedgeheg:Chaos_Control !M!. Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. NL theedgeheg:GUNS counts twice. NL Exhaust.

theEdgeheg:PlayRandomCard_Correct.NAME: Random
theEdgeheg:PlayRandomCard_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Play a random card from the entire card library. NL Exhaust.

theEdgeheg:Butt_Correct.NAME: Show Butt
theEdgeheg:Butt_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Has a random chance of either applying Stun or Vulnerable !M! to enemies. NL It's less effective on Elites and Bosses.

theEdgeheg:SuperDodge_Correct.NAME: Super Dodge
theEdgeheg:SuperDodge_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 theedgeheg:Dodge. NL Keep all of your theedgeheg:Dodge at the start of your next turn.

theEdgeheg:BetterShoot_Correct.NAME: Better Shoot*

theEdgeheg:DoubleStun_Correct.NAME: Double Stun
theEdgeheg:DoubleStun_Correct.DESCRIPTION: theedgeheg:Chaos_Control !M!. NL Stun all enemies AND skips their next turn. NL Exhaust.

theEdgeheg:CSGun_Correct.NAME: Desert Eagle
theEdgeheg:CSGun_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Dexterity and theedgeheg:GUNS count twice. NL If you have the Desert Eagle relic, deal double damage.

theEdgeheg:Heh_Correct.NAME: Heh
theEdgeheg:Heh_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Scales with theedgeheg:GUNS. NL Exhaust.

theEdgeheg:HappiestTimmy_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 theedgeheg:Dodge. NL Add a "Game Designer Timmy" card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theEdgeheg:ArtOfTheBlade_Correct.DESCRIPTION: The first !M! theedgeheg:Katana_Card (s) you play each turn are played twice.

theEdgeheg:DrawBlade_Correct.NAME: Draw Blade
theEdgeheg:DrawBlade_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Draw a theedgeheg:Katana_Card from your Draw Pile.

theEdgeheg:DieDieDie_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. theedgeheg:Precise.

theEdgeheg:GoldKatana_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Fatal: Gain !M! gold.

theEdgeheg:GunSteal_Correct.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! theedgeheg:GUNS. NL Deal !D! Damage.

theEdgeheg:Glare_Correct.NAME: Glare
theEdgeheg:Glare_Correct.DESCRIPTION: theedgeheg:Chaos_Control !M!. NL Target loses !D! HP. NL Apply Vulnerable 1. NL Might stun.

theEdgeheg:Disrobe_Correct.NAME: Disrobe
theEdgeheg:Disrobe_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Apply Vulnerable !M!. NL Draw !M! Cards. NL Discard 1 Card.

theEdgeheg:RandomChaosCard_Correct.DESCRIPTION: theedgeheg:Chaos_Control 1. NL Create a random theedgeheg:Chaos_Card Skill in your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

theEdgeheg:SephirotKatana_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. theedgeheg:Precise. NL Fatal: Permanently increase this card's damage by !M!.

theEdgeheg:SoulSiphon_Correct.DESCRIPTION: theedgeheg:Chaos_Control 2. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Fatal: Heal 1 and gain 1 theedgeheg:Chaos_Energy.

theEdgeheg:RollAndShoot_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !theEdgeheg:SecondMagic! Dodge. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable.

theEdgeheg:BlowCover_Correct.NAME: Blow Cover
theEdgeheg:BlowCover_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies. NL theedgeheg:GUNS increases vulnerable stacks instead of damage.

theEdgeheg:FastRevolver_Correct.NAME: Fast Revolver
theEdgeheg:FastRevolver_Correct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. theedgeheg:Precise Shoot gun. NL Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by 1: Repeat this for every theedgeheg:GUNS stack. NL Exhausts when unupgraded.

theEdgeheg:Fastness_Correct.NAME: Fastness

theEdgeheg:Birthday_Correct.NAME: Birthday
